name: Navios Maritime Partners L.P.
description: Navios Maritime Partners L.P. is a publicly traded limited partnership that focuses on the transportation and logistics of dry bulk commodities. Established in 2007 and headquartered in Athens, Greece, Navios Maritime Partners operates a fleet of modern, high-quality vessels designed to transport a variety of dry bulk cargoes, including iron ore, coal, and grains. The company is recognized for its strategic approach to the shipping industry, utilizing a combination of time charters and spot market operations to optimize fleet utilization and revenue generation. As a leader in the maritime sector, Navios has a commitment to operational excellence, safety, and sustainability, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations while enhancing its service offerings. Navios Maritime Partners L.P. is an integral part of Navios Maritime Holdings Inc., which provides a comprehensive suite of maritime services across the globe. With a strong focus on long-term growth, the company continues to expand its fleet and enhance its operational capabilities through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, making it a key player in the global shipping industry.

seo.meta_title: Navios Maritime Partners L.P. | Leading Dry Bulk Shipping Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Navios Maritime Partners L.P., a leader in dry bulk shipping and logistics. Learn about our fleet, services, and commitment to operational excellence.

faq.question: What does Navios Maritime Partners do?
faq.answer: Navios Maritime Partners focuses on the transportation of dry bulk commodities through its fleet of modern vessels.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Navios Maritime Partners?
faq.answer: Angeliki Frangou is the CEO of Navios Maritime Partners L.P.

faq.question: Where is Navios headquartered?
faq.answer: Navios Maritime Partners is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

faq.question: What types of cargo does Navios transport?
faq.answer: Navios primarily transports dry bulk commodities such as iron ore, coal, and grains.

faq.question: When was Navios Maritime Partners founded?
faq.answer: Navios Maritime Partners was founded in 2007.
